name: The Ritz-Carlton Bangalore
address: 99, Residency Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025
about: The Ritz-Carlton, Bangalore, located in the heart of the city, offers luxurious accommodations, fine dining, and a tranquil spa. Experience legendary service in a sophisticated setting.

images.caption: Exterior view of The Ritz-Carlton Bangalore

name: The Oberoi, New Delhi
address: Dr. Zakir Hussain Marg, New Delhi, Delhi 110003
about: A landmark hotel in the heart of the capital, The Oberoi, New Delhi offers breathtaking views of Delhi Golf Course and Humayun's Tomb. It's a perfect blend of tradition and contemporary sophistication.

name: Taj Lake Palace, Udaipur
address: Pichola, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001
about: Appearing like a mirage in the middle of Lake Pichola, the Taj Lake Palace is one of the most romantic hotels in the world. This heritage hotel features majestic architecture and offers breathtaking views.

images.caption: Taj Lake Palace in Lake Pichola

name: Grand Hyatt Mumbai
address: Bandra Kurla Complex Vicinity, Off Western Express Highway, Santacruz East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400055
about: A multi-dimensional lifestyle complex, Grand Hyatt Mumbai offers a modern and luxurious retreat in the heart of the city, with award-winning dining, an international shopping plaza, and expansive rooms.

name: The Leela Palace Chennai
address: Adyar Seaface, MRC Nagar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600028
about: The Leela Palace Chennai is a modern palace hotel overlooking the Bay of Bengal. It offers luxurious guestrooms, a world-class spa, and a collection of fine dining restaurants.

images.caption: The grand lobby of The Leela Palace

name: The Oberoi Amarvilas, Agra
address: Taj East Gate Rd, Paktola, Tajganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001
about: Located just 600 meters from the Taj Mahal, this luxury hotel offers uninterrupted views of the monument from every room. Experience Mughal-inspired architecture and royal hospitality.

images.caption: View of Taj Mahal from the hotel

name: ITC Mughal, Agra
address: Taj Ganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001
about: A tribute to Mughal architecture, this sprawling resort is set amidst 23 acres of lush gardens. It's a recipient of the prestigious Aga Khan Award for its Mughal-inspired design.

name: BrijRama Palace, Varanasi
address: Darbhanga Ghat, Dashashwamedh, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221001
about: One of the oldest structures in Varanasi, this palace hotel on the banks of the Ganges offers a unique heritage experience. It features traditional decor and stunning river views.

name: Taj Ganges, Varanasi
address: Nadesar Palace Grounds, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221002
about: Set amidst 40 acres of lush greenery, Taj Ganges offers a tranquil escape in the ancient city of Varanasi. Enjoy modern comforts, a large swimming pool, and serene gardens.

name: Renaissance Lucknow Hotel
address: Vipin Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226010
about: A luxury hotel in the heart of Lucknow, offering stunning panoramic views of the city skyline from its rooftop infinity pool. Experience modern design and exceptional service.

name: Wildflower Hall, An Oberoi Resort, Shimla
address: Chharabra, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 171012
about: Set in 22 acres of virgin woods of pine and cedar, the former residence of Lord Kitchener is a fairytale luxury resort. It offers spectacular views of the Himalayas.

name: Manuallaya - The Resort Spa in the Himalayas
address: Sunny Side, Chadiyari, Manali, Himachal Pradesh 175131
about: A magnificent resort in Manali with breathtaking views of the snow-capped Himalayas and the Beas river. It combines traditional Himachali architecture with modern luxury.

name: Hyatt Regency Dharamshala Resort
address: Village Dharamkot, McLeod Ganj, Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh 176219
about: Nestled in the scenic Dhauladhar range, this resort offers a tranquil retreat with luxurious rooms, a spa, and stunning mountain views. It's a perfect base to explore the spiritual and natural beauty of Dharamshala.

name: Fortune Park Dalhousie
address: Near Gandhi Chowk, Dalhousie, Himachal Pradesh 176304
about: Overlooking the picturesque Pir Panjal range, Fortune Park Dalhousie offers a comfortable and elegant stay with modern amenities and warm hospitality, reflecting the charm of the colonial era.

name: Taj Rishikesh Resort & Spa, Uttarakhand
address: Singthali, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand 249192
about: A serene hideaway on the banks of the river Ganges, this resort offers a spiritual and wellness retreat. With its Himalayan architecture and spectacular views, it's a perfect escape.

images.caption: View of Ganges from the resort

name: The Naini Retreat, by Leisure Hotels
address: Ayarpatta, Mallital, Nainital, Uttarakhand 263001
about: The former residence of the Maharaja of Pilibhit, this heritage hotel offers a panoramic view of the Naini Lake and the surrounding hills. It's a blend of colonial charm and modern comforts.

name: JW Marriott Mussoorie Walnut Grove Resort & Spa
address: Village - Siya, Kempty Fall Road, Tehri Garhwal, Mussoorie, Uttarakhand 248179
about: Nestled amidst the serene Himalayan ranges, this resort is a perfect blend of luxury and nature. It offers stunning valley views, a range of recreational activities, and an award-winning spa.

name: Hyatt Regency Dehradun
address: Mussoorie Rd, Salan Gaon, Dehradun, Uttarakhand 248009
about: Situated at the foothills of the Himalayas, this hotel offers a scenic and refreshing experience. It's an ideal destination for both leisure and business travelers, with modern amenities and large event spaces.

name: The Westin Resort & Spa, Himalayas
address: Khasra No. 605, Narendranagar, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand, 249175
about: Nestled in the tranquil Himalayan foothills, this resort offers a rejuvenating escape with its wellness programs, serene atmosphere, and stunning views of the valley.

name: The Manu Maharani
address: Grassmere Estate, Mallital, Nainital, Uttarakhand 263001
about: A premium hotel in Nainital offering breathtaking views of the Naini Lake and the surrounding mountains. It combines modern luxury with old-world charm.

name: Jaypee Residency Manor
address: Barlowganj, Mussoorie, Uttarakhand 248122
about: Perched on a hilltop, this hotel offers a 360-degree panoramic view of the mighty Himalayas. It's a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and scenic beauty.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Dehradun
address: 152/4, Jakhan, Rajpur Road, Dehradun, Uttarakhand 248001
about: Located on the main Rajpur Road, this hotel offers a convenient stay for both business and leisure travelers. Enjoy modern amenities, comfortable rooms, and easy access to the city's attractions.

name: The Lalit Grand Palace Srinagar
address: Gupkar Rd, Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir 190001
about: A former royal palace, this hotel offers stunning views of the Dal Lake and is surrounded by meticulously manicured gardens. Experience the grandeur of Kashmiri royalty.

images.caption: View of the palace hotel and gardens

name: Vivanta Dal View, Srinagar
address: Kralsangri, Brein, Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir 191121
about: Perched on a hilltop, Vivanta Dal View offers panoramic views of the Dal Lake and the surrounding mountains. It's a modern hotel with a touch of Kashmiri charm.

images.caption: Hotel exterior with Dal Lake view

name: The Khyber Himalayan Resort & Spa
address: Hotel Khyber Rd, Forest Block, Gulmarg, Jammu and Kashmir 193403
about: A world-class resort located at an altitude of 8,825 feet in the Pir Panjal range of the Himalayas. It offers breathtaking views of the Apharwat peaks and is a stone's throw away from the Gulmarg Gondola.

images.caption: Heated indoor pool with a view
